website_summaries.verdict: Berghaus designers were successful in making Expeditor Ridge 2.0 extremely comfortable, waterproof, and good-looking. That, and because they successfully crafted a product whose selling price many would consider budget-friendly. The area where they somehow missed the mark, however, is in the width department. All in all, the Berghaus Expeditor Ridge 2.0 is a stellar hiking product thanks to its list of incredible trail-specific qualities. Those who find its fit impossibly confining, though, are welcome to try out the brand’s wider offerings.
pros: A host of wearers praised the Berghaus Expeditor Ridge 2.0’s amazingly comfortable confines
This day hiker was lauded by a multitude of users for its mind-blowing water protection
Its super-stylish design impressed numerous owners
Buyers in droves got their money’s worth purchasing the Expeditor Ridge 2.0
Many reviewers found an extremely lightweight boot in this Berghaus footgear
The shoe runs true to size, according to several testers
Some consumers were stunned by the astonishing grip performance of this day hiking gear
The Berghaus Expeditor Ridge 2.0 was applauded by a couple of patrons for loosening up quickly
cons: Users by the handful had a hard time adjusting to the boot’s unremarkable narrowness
An owner was disappointed with its midsole
He said rocks started to give him a poking sensation on it after only wearing the hiker for 10 miles

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: Cheep rubbish. Didn't last 12 weeks. NO longer waterproof. Very disappointed. Suspect the "leather" upper is the type that you spray on and not the stuff that comes from cows. As soon as the "leather" upper cracked, in came the water. Surprisingly the 'product' was out with the return period - £100 boots only lasting that length of time, I would have thought would be covered by a statutory guarantee, but no not on Amazon. Very neat fit, suggest buying a half size bigger too
customer_reviews.author: henleb

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: My old walking boots were no longer waterproof so the time was right for a new pair. I knew I had bought the right boots as soon as I put these on. Comfortable from the start and wore them for a couple of hours to get the feel, then went for a short walk on the North Downs. Only did 3 or 4 miles and they felt just as comfortable as they did when I put them on. Plenty of mud and unavoidable puddles after recent rain and my feet were dry and the tread was good and no sliding in the mud. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly understated!
customer_reviews.text: They're understated which I like. I mean they don't try to shout their brand at others. Only social mediaists would wear those. They just ooze quality with a lifetime guarantee. My feet have long since stopped growing so it's a no brainer. 100% waterproof, comfortable (once broken in at the heel) about 3 uses. I have wide feet and these are a good fit. If you deliberately wear short trousers, white socks and like garish branded neon ticks and stripes and take selfies of your shoes then these aren't for you. If however you enjoy walking in comfortable, supportive, breathable, top quality, lightweight boots that will last, then look no further.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots
customer_reviews.text: I am tired of buying shoddy Karrimor boots for them to split or tear within a month... so paid more for these boots. What can I say? Quality is FAR superior - very comfortable boots which wear in quickly. Waterproof too. The treads don't wear down quickly too. If these were to wear out, i'd replace them straight away with the same!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. Kapherr

customer_reviews.title: What happened to this respected brand?
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Berghaus boots most of my life. They have always been a perfect fit and of high quality. This latest range is a small fit and, in particular, narrow. They are lighter but I am not confident that they will be as supportive on long treks, Certainly I don't think they would last as long. Why is the quality and spec of outdoor equipment from major brands going down? Returned.
customer_reviews.author: faircomment

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these boots
customer_reviews.text: Only bought these boots last week so only wore them a couple of times. So far I'm very pleased with them. Been really wet past few days and the times I've worn them in the rain , my feet have always been bone dry. Really light and very comfortable. I bough a half size bigger than normal so I can wear thick socks with them and find them perfect size. So far I would certainly recommend these boots.
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Survived a trip to snowy Lapland
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wear on our recent trip to Lapland. Amazon prime really did save the day, another well known retailer decided to notify me these were no longer in stock 2 days before flighting out. Lucky for me Amazon came to the rescue, although a little more expensive the package was delivered the next day 👍. These boots seem to be of good quality and stood up in -10 degrees with plenty of snow and ice. My feet were kept dry and warm the whole time. I ordered half a size up to allow for an extra pair of socks to be worn.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not fair wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought Berghaus for years they are usually good quality and a reasonable price Unfortunately I’ve had to return these because in less than a year they are falling to pieces The upper rubber detailing has disintegrated and the soles have come away from the uppers on both boots I walk dogs about three miles a day it’s not like I’m up Scarfell Pike each weekend I also have the use of other boots In short not pleased with these boots and I will try Salomon next time
customer_reviews.author: savao

customer_reviews.title: Good value dog walking boot
customer_reviews.text: For the price these boots are great for light use such as dog walking. They are extremely comfortable and so incredibly light compared to other boots I have or have previously owned. The only criticism I have is that if you wear them to walk through wet grass they are NOT waterproof. I have tried applying dubbing and that lasts for a few walks but then has to be reapplied. Given that they are leather it is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: M A KELSALL

customer_reviews.title: Not a robust boot
customer_reviews.text: These are not hiking boots that meet the quality I would expect from Berghaus. As others have mentioned they were a little on the narrow side but not excessively so I decided to keep them. On the positive side they are very light and waterproofing is excellent. However after after 15 months of ownership the left boot has split for about 1.5 inches along the outer seam between the sole and the upper. The boots were only occasionally used over winter months as I have an alternative heavier duty pair more suited for cold weather, so actual usage probably only covered 10 months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect long life boots
customer_reviews.text: Lasted nearly one year before the water started to seep through. Even though they were treated regularly with boot cleaner and conditioner. The laces are flat and far too long with a tendency to come undone unless tied exceptionally tight. Not always good for the feet. Wouldn't buy another pair. Now looking at Go Outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: old soldier

customer_reviews.title: Worst boot I've ever had!  Avoid
customer_reviews.text: As a hiker I should have known better; you really do get what you pay for with hiking boots. I'm not even convinced these are genuine. I can't even be bothered to type how bad they are. Feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and immediately comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent replacement for my previous lightweight boots. Very light for an all leather boot. Comfortable immediately. May not suit people with wider feet as the boots are quite slim. I ordered one size bigger than my shoe size, I always do with walking boots. Walked about 50 miles in them so far, some in the wet. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Revised review..
customer_reviews.text: I discovered the item had been delivered, but left outside just behind my side entry gate,it had not handed to anyone. Fortunately it was well packaged as it had probably been there for three days.and was externally wet. Still no harm done. The item was all as described and looks to be good quality so I have given it five stars, pity about the delivery mess up, but we all make mistakes!
customer_reviews.author: PR Snowy

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for work - I walk various distances between jobs - and they are very comfortable. I have worn these in a Volcano in Lanzarote and gave great protection. The ground was NOT molten lava - but did have an increased surface temperature! They are great for trekking, hillwalking and walking on roads/pavements. I have no current inclination to buy any other brand than Berghaus in the future based on these boots. Value for money and their comfort - Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: s fisher

customer_reviews.title: When is size 9 not a size 9.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace an older pair of Berghaus boots. The old pair were size 9 and fitted very well. I was wrong to think a new size 9 from the same manufacturer would be the same. The sole is a full 6mm narrower measured at the same place. Very uncomfortable and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Corkman

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot except it chaffed on the Ankle
customer_reviews.text: A good looking boot from Berghaus who seem to be one of the few who do half sizes. The time had come to replace my existing Berhaus. However on the first outing these rubbed on my right ankle and blistered it within a very short distance. So they were returned.
customer_reviews.author: Astillsmallvoice

customer_reviews.title: Boots hurting my foot
customer_reviews.text: They are Hurting my foot, bought a pair of boots the same make but we're too small so ordered a different boot but same make half a size bigger and they are a bit big and hurting my left foot,. They are a bit big but also narrow. This will be the last time I buy shoes in line. Should have bought another lpair of Rockport s
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Just what my feet needed
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these boots - so light to wear and very comfortable - obviously only been wearing for 10 days but so far extremely pleased with purchase - haven't had any rain to see how they perform in the wet and snow - but will update after a couple of months wear. We walk at least 3 to 4 miles every day 365 days a year with our cocker spaniel so they will get a good workout.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia D

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I must say that these boots are excellent, all-weather walking boots. I usually wear a UK size 8, ordered 8 1/2 but they were returned to Amazon as I found them too small and replaced with a UK 9. They are comfortable when walking but tend to be a bit on the tight side if worn all day. If I purchase another pair in the future they will be 9 1/2 just to relieve that feeling of tightness by the end of a day of wearing. Well made, lovely boots, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Winnett

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw on the laces
customer_reviews.text: It's the third time I buy a pair in the Explorer series and you will find anything that is good about it: incredible waterproofing, comfort, the hoes are really light etc .. However, for this new version, they added flat laces (instead of round ones), that have the very bad tendency of undoing easily. It's not easy to replace them with a round one, as the holes are not fitted for this, so the only solution is to make a double node in order for it to hold properly.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Boots
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable, waterproof and well made. What more could you want for a pair of walking boots. Very premium feeling material and the soles are still going strong after almost a year of regular walking (Twice a week). Pair them with some waterproofing wax or spray to keep them in tip top shape and you'll never need another pair of boots again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dont bother
customer_reviews.text: started to squeak after a few weeks which drove me mad then the squeaking stopped as the sole feel off !! apart from that they where water proof, also seems the window to return has expired so I am stuck with an expensive waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. J. Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Well made sturdy and comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: These are my first Berghaus boots and I am very impressed, they are a lot lighter than expected but feel very well made and sturdy too. Have found them to be very comfortable and fit well though I did get a half size bigger as my feet are quite wide and other reviews have said the size is a little small. I have found that fit and comfort are both very good I would recommend these boots highly. Great service and delivery too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Only worn 3 times so far, but comfortable straight out of the box. Will be interesting to see how they fair come the bad weather with being worn daily on our dog walk. Hope leather doesn’t crack and stay waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: sandratri

customer_reviews.title: Good VFM
customer_reviews.text: They feel a bit rubbery - but they are also a bit cheaper than what I normally buy. Pretty hot to wear all day too. Good VFM
customer_reviews.author: RANDAMNATION

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous pair of boots
customer_reviews.text: Lovely soft and comfortable. Been out twice so far once in sloppy mud and the water with the dogs. I’m a size 7 usually buy size 8 as there was a 7.5 I ordered them and fit perfectly don’t need an extra pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow a fit now
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems ok, however fit is narrower than previous Berghaus boots I've owned, so will have to find a wider fitting boot manfacturer now
customer_reviews.author: Nessimm

customer_reviews.title: Ok if you don’t mind wet feet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these for 2 months now without a problem. They’ve both started to leek and I’ll be returning them and buying gortex instead. Nicely designed boots but shame that they are so flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: great comfort
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair I have bought for my partner. He loves the fact they are lightweight, comfortable as don't need any 'wearing in' . They stand up to daily dog walks in all seasons on pebble beach and forest
customer_reviews.author: linda sumner

customer_reviews.title: good boots
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable from the start which is important only minor gripes the top wraps are too small and close together and some of the stiching is badly finished. Can't coment on water impreganation at this point but I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Good looking walking boot
customer_reviews.text: Unable to quote on above as buying this for my son for exmas, looks good boot. Expensive but worth it if they fit, and are waterproof and warm like description says will no at christmas .
customer_reviews.author: kat

customer_reviews.title: For a well, great for walking in and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Fit is as expected. I have used it multiple weekends and it provides great support throughout the foot on hilly and muddy terrain. From my experience so far it remains waterproof and I am hoping this lasts. Can recommend if you are doing local trails and are looking for a good looking sturdy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: IS

customer_reviews.title: Narrow fitting
customer_reviews.text: Well made boots but too narrow a fit, I've had Berghaus before and was pleased with the fit but these are the second pair I've tried and they were both a narrow boot
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: So far, so great.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable from the outset. Great fit and feel. Worn through long wet grass whilst walking dogs and proving to be waterproof. I’m a big fan of Berghaus gear and these haven’t let the brand down.
customer_reviews.author: Del

customer_reviews.title: Failed stitching
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light weight, all was going well until 5 months in (2 months after the return window closed) the stitching on the side gave way. I'll not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: James Upton

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: We have had these boots for year's and they are very comfortable from the first walk. You can expect around 1-2 years general weekend use before they lose their proper waterproofing (can stand in runing water!!) but then they gradually let water in, but we have found they are still good for many years. probably the last ones lasted us 8 years before they finally wear out. We walk most weekends for at least 2hrs, then longer day trips in the alps and The lakes when on holiday.
customer_reviews.author: J Allan

customer_reviews.title: Fairly solid and reliable so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought for moderate hiking about the Surrey hills, and fine so far. Not intending to do anything too strenuous, but fit is good, they are solid and waterproof, and no concerns as yet. Price was good,and they are very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots
customer_reviews.text: Great product from a good manufacturer. I priced walking boots in the stores and the prices were ridiculous. So, went online and found these boots for half the price of the store prices - great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Look ok
customer_reviews.text: Have given 4 stars as they are a Christmas present and need to see how they wear. Will update after they have had some punishment walking our dogs on beaches and in forest
customer_reviews.author: linda sumner

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots.. perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots I have had. They are light, sturdy and waterproof. I did buy a half size bigger, after reading other reviews. Good advice, fit is perfect. I normally have a 10, the half size bigger, allows for the wider fit. Walk around 15-20 miles a month on adverage so hopefully will get a few years wear.
customer_reviews.author: DA, Witney

customer_reviews.title: great quality and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots given the high ratings in the other reviews. A sound decision! They are light, confortable, well made and robust. I advise buyers to buy a pair that is a size larger than their foot size (which is what I did) in order to accommodate thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boots comfortable and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great. Had a similar pair for 5 years and when fell apart tried to replace with identical boots. After research these came close. Really comfortable and waterproof. If they last as long as previous pair will be delighted as they were used extensively before having to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: cath

customer_reviews.title: No to generous in the size department.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent boot I ordered a size 7 and really the fit I found was exact. So in that light if you needed to wear thick socks you would struggle I think. You need to go a half or one size up. Otherwise great boot.
customer_reviews.author: Zero

customer_reviews.title: Plain looking,but great quality
customer_reviews.text: Quite plain looking boots,but usual Berghaus quality,great fit,wont take long to walk in,quality at a fantastic price,feel sturdy on the feet,nice boot
customer_reviews.author: Bluesterno

customer_reviews.title: Walkers
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of walking in the lakes and these are the most comfortable steady boots I’ve purchased , love them 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Bri Davison

customer_reviews.title: As good as you get
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these Boots I've tried over the years all the major brands Mendel Solomon etc I do between 40 and 60 km across country rivers and streams a week the truth is they last me between 6 and 8 months which in my experience is as good as any other brand but at a better price
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Berghaus do make very comfortable boots but I'm afraid their alleged waterproofing is poor. My feet were wet after walking for an hour through wet vegetation. Very disappointing and will complain to them. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Phil Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots.
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of walking boots, comfortable and most definitely waterproof. Quite a narrow fit which is perfect for me but to be considered before buying if you have wider fitting feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dickenarry

customer_reviews.title: Great but slightly narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. I found it slightly narrow, but after a couple of walks it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave me blisters
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying quality, they have been the worst walking boots I’ve ever had! Never again
customer_reviews.author: this is a good game and I think the description of it tells the truth if you have minecraft get this

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Only wore them 3 times now 14 miles 1st time, 8 miles second time & 15 miles yesterday in wet weather and wet grass. was greta to get back to the car with dry feet. They are really comfy and I'm really pleased with them so far.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Comfortable & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised how lightweight these boots are & they felt comfortable from the first moment i walked in them, most boots you have to bed in but not these.
customer_reviews.author: GARETH D DAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product and excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light weight boot which fits just right. I have a size 9 with average width foot and these are perfect. Fantastic price as well!
customer_reviews.author: Chris R

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was a present and he said fit well, they are light and waterproof, good on the snow too.
customer_reviews.author: kenzi

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant,excellent quality and great price.They arrived on time and nicely packaged. The fit is great and are extremely comfortable and brimming with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ammok

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They look better in pictures but they still looks good enough in person, really comfortable, lots of support, and nice to walk in, last peat of Berghaus boots I had lasted me 10 years so let’s hope that these will last that long
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Well fitting boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Very comfortable and sturdy. Fit as expected for size ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Claire B

customer_reviews.title: Boots
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boots, comfortable, light weight and well made. Take great pleasure in highly recommending
customer_reviews.author: C Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These are my third pair of these boots, I use them for work so need to be tough but comfy. These are the best ones I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Seaman

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes will last forever.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and indistructable (have had my previous pair 12 years and still look good as new).
customer_reviews.author: Daan

customer_reviews.title: If your buying hiking boots they are the one to have.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, waterproof and hard wearing, a sound buy impress with the quality
customer_reviews.author: lee goldspink

customer_reviews.title: narrow boot
customer_reviews.text: i felt that these were too narrow.the stitching went near the little toe on the right boot.too late to return as i usually keep a second pair of walking boots.i bought a second pair half a size up and the stitching went by the big toe.so i'm not happy with berghaus.
customer_reviews.author: malcolm colin jones

customer_reviews.title: Good Boot.
customer_reviews.text: Used as a work boot on the farm. Second pair I have bought. Last pair have lasted 2 years with constant daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Stayte

customer_reviews.title: Useless in wet weather
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light and good for dry weather hiking but absolutely useless in the wet. After less then an hour walking in mild rain my socks and feet were soaked. Tried to return to Amazon but too late and Berghaus customer service wouldn't do anything as didn't buy direct.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: Walking boots. So far very good.
customer_reviews.text: Product very good as advertised,delivery excellent arrived within two days. Would recommend product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light boots...
customer_reviews.text: Light waterproof boots at a great price, well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: The Colonel

customer_reviews.title: Great boots the ridge expeditor  will have a hard act too follow the ridge explorer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price on Black Friday deal so bought two pairs my old ridge explorers have been brilliant may get this winter out of them lasted years
customer_reviews.author: s.fincham

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit, never need breaking in. Never had a problem. Sturdy, light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Lovely pair of boots. One less thing to worry about over long distance
customer_reviews.author: P&P

customer_reviews.title: great comfortable and affordable boots
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of extremely comfortable shoes. I am a uk 10.5 and a 11 fitted me perfectly. They didn’t need too much walking in and I wore these for 5 days straight hiking 80+ km through the Chernobyl exclusion zone without issue, cannot recommend these boots enough!
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Split on seam
customer_reviews.text: Paid extra to get a good quality boot and these have both split in 10 months. Loads of wear left on the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Pegg

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Get fed up of companies taking no responsibility for their product design. Whilst comfy boots - please do not believe claims that they are waterproof :(
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality walking boot
customer_reviews.text: Up to now very good boots, as I would expect from Berghaus Great fit for length maybe slightly narrow but I've got wide feet Great price
customer_reviews.author: head greenkeeper

customer_reviews.title: The boots are robust and waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Great boots except for the poor quality laces which constantly become unravelled and are far too long
customer_reviews.author: barry

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Had these less than a month and the front of the boot is getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: colour description
customer_reviews.text: fit and quality as you expect from top brand colour not as i would describe black
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive,over priced
customer_reviews.text: Boot,product,isnt flexable,bendable,I feel on a long walk,Hellsvellan,in the Lakes,the boots are not comfortable enough. Defenately not worth £80,half that would be nearer.
customer_reviews.author: keithdavies

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: love these , so light but sturdy, use for Ben Nevis and local walking, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Macindoe

customer_reviews.title: Reliable on all terrains
customer_reviews.text: A good mid ranged priced boot, I’m on my 4 th pair and will continue to buy them as long as they keep the quality up and the price acceptable
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hargreaves

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy, waterproof boots.
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for some good sturdy, waterproof boots for ages. These are perfect. Good ankle and arch support. Waterproof, even after multiple wears. Easy to clean. Perfect for long or short walks
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Skerratt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great boots last well keep feet warm and dry with a good grip to the sole
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Seem very well made but narrow across the front part of the foot - shame
customer_reviews.author: dmsims

customer_reviews.title: Bit small
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 5 for my wife fitted perfect. Bought a 10 for me, couldn’t get foot in!
customer_reviews.author: Halfpenny farm animal sanctuary

customer_reviews.title: Boss
customer_reviews.text: Perfect as you would expect from Berghaus. So comfy. Went on an 8 mile walk in them straight from taking out the box and not one problem, or blister!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: It a brand name you should be able to trust.. Might up date after doing the West Highland way
customer_reviews.author: stephen hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Check if water proof!!
customer_reviews.text: Wore boots once, when I got home right boot had leaked. NOT WATERPROOF AD STATED!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Hindmarsh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, they came to Iceland with us, comfortable, waterproof, good in snow, help with slippery ice. Great buy- they look good too!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 8.5. It says 8.5 on the box but only 8 on the inside of the boot itself. Why is this???
customer_reviews.author: mr m j maclean

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 UK. These were too narrow. Returned and money refunded.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Lace loops broke after 3 wears
customer_reviews.text: I need to return these boot as the lace loops broke after wearing 3 times
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Dry and comfortable feet each time.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the boots. I have used them on quite a few walks now, pendle hill, pen-y-gent, whernside, ingleborough etc in rain, sun, even snow. Dry and comfortable feet each time.
customer_reviews.author: MI5

customer_reviews.title: NICE LOOKING BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: ARRIVED very quickly 3 days, very happy with everything boots are true to size i am uk 10 they fit great..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now have an item I can not use
customer_reviews.text: I have a size 10 but purchased a size 10.5, but they are too small...
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Walking boot
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow , laces wore out quickly not up to usual berghaus standards
customer_reviews.author: Gerard S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made light on the feet boot.
customer_reviews.text: Well made boot. Soles are well sealed to the upper. Stitching is good and feels light on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Best boots I ever wore.
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I ever wore, light an comfortable the only thing they are a narrow fit but that's ok with feet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Does what you want thats wot you needs
customer_reviews.text: Do a lot of walking really good boot and iv try loads 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Light, Waterproof and Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light waterproof and as comfortable after a 5 hour hike as they were at the start of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Singin Pub

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, well made boots.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly they are not actually black. The colour is dark grey. They do however look good and perform very well. Very comfortable and well made. The ankle support system us excellent. Good grip on wet surfaces and so far seem waterproof. They look a little narrow but actually feel like a normal fit. So far they seem to shrug mark's and mud pretty well. Will write another review on their longevity after more wear.
customer_reviews.author: lesleyt

product_meta.title: Berghaus Men's Expeditor Ridge 2.0 Walking Boots High Rise Hiking
product_meta.description: Waterproof your feet - banish muddy puddles from your worry list and concentrate on the trail ahead
feature_bullets: Waterproof your feet - banish muddy puddles from your worry list and concentrate on the trail ahead
Thanks to the breathable AQ waterproof lining, your feet can stay cool and dry
Built to last - the durable scuff-resistant treated leather upper is ready for anything
The Expeditor Ridge 20’s leather is made in a tannery certified for environmental performance by the Leather Working Group
